/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly white and red, rise up to meet the sky, their facades punctuated by occasional splashes of greenery. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The street is also lined with trees, their leaves forming a natural canopy over the urban setting. Above, the sky is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vista.
